text: The iHeartRadio Music Awards for Best Music Video is one of the awards handed out at the yearly iHeartRadio Music Award. It was first awarded in 2017 and presented to Fifth Harmony for their song "Work From Home". Harry Styles was first winning British artist. Taylor Swift's song "Delicate" was the first solo female artist to win and latest awarded in this category. Cardi B is the most nominated artist in this category.https://variety.com/2019/music/news/2019-iheart-radio-music-award- nominations-1203102954/ == Recipients == {| class="wikitable sortable" ! scope="col" style="width:4em;" | Year !
